Title: May I Trim Your Hedges?
Writer: John Wells (developer), Paul Abbott (creator), Krista Vernoff
Actors: William H. Macy, Emmy Rossum, Justin Chatwin, Ethan Cutkosky
Plot: Frank tells Carl he has cancer in order to scam a charity foundation. Fiona is blown away by what's asked of her in her new job. Lip hunts for a neighborhood pedophile.
